name: S2019 Fore-head
description:
You are on vacation on a tropical island pursuing your favorite hobby: extreme head golf.  After detaching your head to use as the ball, you kick it through the course using as few strokes as possible. Try to complete all 9 holes in less than 100 kicks!

Note: The web version has a minor bug with the score card. Download the Windows version for the optimal playing experience. (Mac version coming soon). 

Controls:

WASDCharacter Movement
QE
Rotate Character
SpaceKickJJumpFCancel Kick
MMulligan
CHide and show camera
ESCShow Settings Menu
